categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: Fantail-class destroyers were warships made by the Corporate Alliance.

Around 34 BBY, Corporate Alliance Fantail-class destroyers along with Sikurdian privateer vessels blockaded the Malastare Narrows to settle a dispute over fuel allocations. In the subsequent Battle of Malastare Narrows, Alliance Admiral Trench lost his flagship and the blockade was disbanded.
Fantail-class ships later served in the Confederate Navy during the Clone Wars. Amongst other scenes, they were a prominent part of the Confederate fleet at the Battle of Belderone.
Leland Chee has confirmed the Fantail is the same ship that is pictured in the Corporate Alliance's Databank entry.
